column4: I went into localhost:631 to configure cups what is the username and password
you may want to check the ubuntu wiki/forums - cups is sort of locked down by default - you wont be able to change anything.
damn so I can't install my printer?
I can't do it without being about to get into localhost:631
you have tried the gnome printer config tool?
I forgot gnome has a little wizard to do it
This is way different than other *nix distros
:P  they actually try to make things easy eh?
Yeah I am not used to "easy"
its so handy to have 2+ hard drives however.
:P  you can enable the full power of cups if ya want. its mentioned in the forums. but i havent needed to.
